main event: A spherical object of metallic then bluish color was observed hovering and swaying before it disappeared to the northeast at high speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 1 minute,The object was described as having a metallic appearance and was initially observed as white,The object exhibited a side-to-side swaying motion while hovering,The lack of sufficient data led to inconclusive identification of the object,The sighting took place in Jefferson, Texas, under clear night conditions.
witness description: no witnesses confirmed in the report
